Articles.Content:
The kerbal wiki informs me that Valentina has a ponytail.

![valentina_zpsk1uetqgy.jpg](http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b344/planettom/KSP2015/valentina_zpsk1uetqgy.jpg)

How can you tell? Is there some way to get a Kerbal to take off their helmet?

Ok I see. When you look from slightly above you can see the ponytail:

![valentina2_zpsrnscglqn.jpg](http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b344/planettom/KSP2015/valentina2_zpsrnscglqn.jpg)

You can IVA to see characters without their helmets.

![fnAVoem.png](http://i.imgur.com/fnAVoem.png)

Interesting article about the design of Valentina.

Designing Valentina Kerman, a perfect badass Kerbonaut for Kerbal Space Program
